testcase.name: test that it will initially set up the translation language with the default language
test that it will not translate text if it does not have a translation key
test that it will translate text to french if it has a translation key and the current language is french
test that it will toggle the current language to french if it is english
test that it will only translate text on a specific page when a page is passed in
test that it will translate text on a specific text-key basis, with one formatting argument {0}
test that it will translate text on a specific text-key basis, with multiple arguments {0}, {1}, ...
test that it will translate text on a specific page in a language that is passed in and not the 'current' language of the app
test that it will check for calling method getCurrentLanguage is return right value
test that it will check for calling method getCurrentLanguage for French language is return right value
test that it will check for calling method getCurrentLanguage for French language is not return right value
test that it will check for calling method getCurrentLanguage is return not right value
